title: '90s Girls and Burritos - The GameOverGreggy Show Ep. 6
description:
Tim wants to know who your '90s crushes were, Greg wants to know what superpower you'd want, and Colin asks if American exceptionalism is a real thing. No one remembers what Nick's topic was because we drank whiskey for two hours.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE/BUY MERCH: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Mentioned in this episode...
- IGN interviews the Green Ranger: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aY8rHA0QzG8
- #365Thanks Gregway: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j3QF4clbAqc&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVv1g9oZi6O95CwRHQd0ulT6&feature=c4-overview-vl

Each and every Monday, Greg, Colin, Nick, and Tim get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Subscribe to our channel: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

Buy the MP3 version of the show on Band Camp: http://gameovergreggy.bandcamp.com

Merchandise available for you body: http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy
